mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users(userNickname,userName,userId,userPassword,userEmail,userImage) VALUES( #{userNickname}, #{userName}, #{userId}, #{userPassword}, #{userEmail},#{userImage} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE userNickname = #{userNickname}, userName = #{userName}, userId = #{userId}, userPassword = #{userPassword}, userStatus = #{userStatus}, userPoint = #{userPoint}, userEmail = #{userEmail}, userImage = #{userImage}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM users WHERE userStatus=#{status} And userNickname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{word},'%')
